name: first meeting
commands: I know this comes out weird, but do you know who I am? I don't remember...
Sigh, I guess we're in the same boat, then.
This looks pretty bad so we had better do something.
I hope you don't mind us staying together.
I mean, don't be silly in this situation!
We need to do something or this will get really bad.
Err... Now, now, don't cry. It's going to be alright. I promise!
There, there. Good girl. I'm with you so no need to worry.
I might remember if you give a kiss...
You know, your brain is in even more pitiful shape than mine.
Yet, I have to stay with you since I don't think I'd get out of here alone.
I don't know if I even want to remember how I ended up here with you...
